text70:
I highly recommend testing this lip color out at Olive Young first. 

Color: 
I don't think this color will work with all skin tones. I was pretty surprised with how vibrant and coral the color was. I only applied a little bit, yet it was still popping. I think a full lip will be a bit overwhelming. 

Product: 
Product-wise, this is excellent quality! The color lasts a long time.
